title: Swap Champs in Practice mode / Play Practice mode with friends
body:
I got 2 cool idears for Practice Mode 
1. That you can swap champs in this mode so you dont have to leave and create a new game


2. You can Practis with you friend so when you want to show him a cool combo you just invite him abd id would be cool a 1v1 with non CDR
and than it is better for youtuber like Vandarill...


Im not Nativ English/American so pls excuse my English{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Wie wärs wenn ihr anstelle gebrochenes Englisch zu schreiben, Deutsch verwenden würdet^^
War mein erster Kommentar und das mein erster Artikel den ich gelesen habe, dachte es wär normal XD{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

i think it would be grate to, if you could make a "normal" botgame (in 5 vs 5) and invite up to nine Players. So you could practice some things with your friend, practice teamfights with some teamcomps and against them etc. But i would say only the Maker of the game should be able to use commands, but then for all Players of the map. And it would be a good idea if you could coordinate your bots with smart pings. That would probably help a lot (its rly anoying trying something in a botgame and all of your bots are running botlane, when you want to try how fast comp xy can kill the baron). But that would be a lot of work too, but still, i think that these are good ideas. 

sry for my english, i am not a native Speaker.
